**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Windchaser](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2259) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 105 **Perception** +16; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18 **Str** +6 **Dex** +1 **Con** +6 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +2 --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +15 **Will** +16 **HP** 138 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=6)** DC 26 --- **Speed** 40 feet **Melee** hoof +20, **Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning **Gallop** Windchaser Strides twice, gaining a +10-foot circumstance bonus to their Speed during these Strides.
name: Windchaser
